intents.response: Hello! I'm EchoNova's AI assistant. How can I help you today?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How can I assist you with your EchoNova services?
You're welcome! Do you need help with anything else?
To check your balance, dial *123# or open the EchoNova app and go to 'My Balance'.
Your remaining data balance is displayed in the EchoNova app under 'Data Usage' or dial *124#.
You can check your call balance by dialing *123*2# or via the 'Call Balance' section in the app.
To know your free SMS count, dial *123*3# or check 'SMS Packs' in the EchoNova app.
To recharge, visit the 'Recharge' tab in the app or dial *123*1# and follow the prompts.
You can view your plan details in the app under 'My Plan', including validity and benefits.
Your current plan includes unlimited calls, 100 SMS/day, and 1.5GB/day data. Check 'Benefits' in the app for more.
We offer multiple prepaid plans starting from ₹99 to ₹2999. Check 'Prepaid Plans' in the app to choose your favorite.
Postpaid plans start from ₹399 to ₹9999 with various benefits. See 'Postpaid Plans' in the EchoNova portal.
Your last recharge was on [date] for ₹[amount]. View your full history in the 'Transactions' section.
To view your bill details, log into the EchoNova portal, go to 'My Bills' and select the billing cycle.
You can pay your bill online via the EchoNova app using UPI, debit card, or net banking under 'Pay Bill'.
Your next bill due date is displayed in the app under 'My Bills'. Please pay by then to avoid late fees.
Enable AutoPay in the app under 'Bill Settings' to automatically settle your bill each month.
If you haven't received the OTP, please wait a few seconds or request again. Ensure your network connectivity is stable.
To activate a new SIM, insert it and dial 12345 or visit your nearest EchoNova store with ID proof.
For SIM replacement, visit an EchoNova service center with valid ID proofs and fill out a SIM request form.
If your SIM is lost, immediately call customer care at 1800-123-4567 to deactivate it and request a new one.
To port your number, dial 1900 for a UPC code, then submit it at an EchoNova outlet along with KYC documents.
Experiencing network issues? Try restarting your phone, toggling Airplane mode, or contact support if problems persist.
If your internet is slow, ensure you’re in 4G/5G coverage. You can also restart your device or check data usage.
Check 4G coverage in your area via the 'Network Map' feature in the EchoNova app.
5G is available in selected cities. Use the '5G Availability' section in the EchoNova app to verify coverage.
To enable international roaming, go to 'Roaming & International' in the app or dial *123*ROAM#.
VoLTE is enabled by default on most devices. Ensure 'Enhanced Calling' is turned on in your phone settings.
To set up a hotspot, go to Settings > Personal Hotspot and enable it. Data charges will apply.
If you face call drops, try moving to another location or switch network mode. Contact support if the issue continues.
Activate call forwarding via the app under 'Call Settings' or dial **21*<number># to forward all calls.
Set up voicemail by dialing 121. Follow the voice prompts to record your personal greeting.
Enable Missed Call Alert in the app under 'Services' to get notifications for missed calls.
To manage DND settings, go to Preferences > DND Settings in your EchoNova app.
Set your caller tune via the Caller Tunes section in the app or dial 56789.
Available SMS packs start at ₹19 for 100 SMS. Check 'SMS Packs' in the EchoNova app.
We offer data packs from 1GB to 200GB. Browse 'Data Packs' in the app for pricing and validity.
Current recharge and data offers are listed under 'Offers' in the app. Don't miss special discounts!
We provide family plans under 'Family & Friends'. Share data and call benefits across up to 5 lines.
Manage multiple SIMs in the 'Manage SIMs' section of the EchoNova app.
For customer care, dial 1800-123-4567 (24/7) or use the 'Chat with Us' feature in the app.
To lodge a complaint, go to Help & Support > Raise a Ticket in the app, or call 1800-123-4567.
We appreciate your feedback! Please submit it via the Home page or use 'Feedback' in the app.
Refund requests are processed within 7 business days. Check status under 'My Refunds' in the portal.
To upgrade your plan, visit My Plan > Change Plan in the EchoNova app.
To downgrade, go to My Plan > Change Plan and select a more cost-effective option.
Enable usage alerts in Settings to get notified when you reach 80% of your data or call quota.
Data rollover is available on select plans. Check your eligibility under 'Rollover Settings' in the app.
Activate roaming via 'Roaming & International' in the app or SMS ACT <country_code> to 123.
View the interactive Network Map in the app to see real-time coverage in your area.
Most modern 4G/5G devices are compatible. Check your device model in 'Device Support' in the app.
Hotspot speeds match your plan's data speed. Heavy usage may be throttled after high-speed data is exhausted.
Download your bill PDF under 'My Bills' > Download Bill in the EchoNova portal.
We offer device EMIs. Check 'Device EMI Plans' in the app for interest-free options up to 24 months.
Upgrade your device via 'Upgrade' in the app. Choose your new device and EMI plan.
Enable security alerts under 'Alerts & Notifications' to stay informed about suspicious activity.
Use 'Find My Device' services through our partner app. Go to Security > Locate Device in the app.
Glad to hear that! 😊 What else can I do for you?
I'm sorry to hear that. How can I improve your EchoNova experience?
I'm here to help with your EchoNova services - plans, balance, support, and more! What would you like to do?
